content.txt1: Jerbal in emaron̄ kōm̧m̧ane jerbal ko āinwōt jerbal ko an armej ro ekoba, bōtaab ejjab jemļo̧k wōt n̄an kōļapļo̧k, kōpeļļo̧k app ko, im ko jet ilo taļboon eo am̧, im emaron̄ barāinwōt kōpeļļo̧k jet kōjerbal ko n̄an kōļļā. Kōnke ewōr jorrāān ko an jerbal ko kar rekoote, kōm̧m̧ani kōļļā ko, im ko jet, kōmij lukkuun kōketak bwe kwon kōm̧m̧ane wōt eļan̄n̄e kwoj lukkuun meļeļe kōn men ko ilo script eo.
content.txt2: Ewi wāween am̧ kōjem̧ļo̧k jerbal in: Kōpeļļo̧k peij eo an m̧weo, komaron̄ bōjrak jān am̧ kōjerbal jerbal in jipan̄ eo ilo peij ko an m̧weo, ak komaron̄ kōtļo̧k "Kōm̧m̧ane aolep jerbal ko im diwōjļo̧k" button ilo peij eo an m̧weo. Button in ej kōm̧m̧an bwe en jem̧ļo̧k aolep jerbal ko rej kōm̧m̧ani im kōm̧m̧an bwe en kōjem̧ļo̧k app in.
content.txt3: Un eo unin ad kōjerbal jerbal in ej bwe kōjerbal eo ad ej aikuj wōr an maron̄ n̄an kōpeļļo̧k jerbal ko jet im kōjparok er, āinwōt n̄e ej browse insgram, emaron̄ in make waļo̧k ālkin pija eo ej kōm̧m̧an, lale eļan̄n̄e juon men ej pād ilo wia kake, im jilkinļo̧k ennaan ko n̄an ro m̧ōttad ilo online aolep iien, etc., ko rej itoklimo ak jerbal in kōjparok jerbal.
content.iKnowDanger: Ijeḷā kōn jorrāān ko - etal ñan set .
content.title: Jerbal ko rekauwōtata
